intro: Pleurospermum thalictrifolium, commonly known as the heartleaf pleurospermum, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a member of the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads and herbaceous growth habit. The plant features finely divided, fern-like leaves that give it a delicate appearance. It produces small, yellowish to white flowers arranged in clusters, typically blooming in spring. Pleurospermum thalictrifolium is often grown as an ornamental plant in gardens due to its attractive foliage and modest flowering.
